Body: Possible Duplicate:  Why is my device not utilizing all of its available RAM?  I have new problem with my Novo 7 Basic, Android 3.2, 8GB, 512 MB** RAM: When I go into Tools -> System Info (have CPU, Display, Memory...) in Memory Info: Total Mem 343.MB + Free Mem   36.048 MB (Inactive     94.496 MB  When I used : "Android Assitant app ", it shows my Memory info (RAM) is:Used : 183,96MB Free:  150,95MB Total: 334.96 MB"RAM Manager Free software ", it says that Memory info is:MemTotal: 343.000 MB & MemFree: 7012 kBBut my tablet is supposed to have 512 MB of RAM. Please explain this to me (for any problems or errors). How do I activate the "inactive mem 94.496 MB"?
Title: How to active the RAM memory which is differents with 512 MB when buying
